name: Intercom
natural_language_description: 这是 Intercom 节点。主要用于: Consume Intercom API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user
available_options: Company (值: company) - Companies allow you to represent commercial organizations using your product
Lead (值: lead) - Leads are useful for representing logged-out users of your application
User (值: user) - The Users resource is the primary way of interacting with Intercom
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new company
Get (值: get) - Get data of a company
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get data of many companies
Update (值: update) - Update a company
Users (值: users) - List company's users
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

id.name: id
id.description: The Intercom defined ID representing the Lead
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: The Intercom defined ID representing the Lead | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: segment_id (值: None) - Segment representing the Lead
tag_id (值: None) - Tag representing the Lead

selectBy.name: selectBy
selectBy.description: What property to use to query the company
selectBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select By | 作用: What property to use to query the company
available_options: Company ID (值: companyId) - The company_id you have given to the company
ID (值: id) - The Intercom defined ID representing the company
Name (值: name) - The name of the company

value.name: value
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: View by value | (必填项)

updateBy.name: updateBy
updateBy.description: The property via which to query the lead
updateBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update By | 作用: The property via which to query the lead | 默认值: id
available_options: User ID (值: userId) - Automatically generated identifier for the Lead
ID (值: id) - The Intercom defined ID representing the Lead

identifierType.name: identifierType
identifierType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Identifier Type | 作用: Unique string identifier
available_options: User ID (值: userId) - A unique string identifier for the user. It is required on creation if an email is not supplied.
Email (值: email) - The user's email address. It is required on creation if a user_id is not supplied.

idValue.name: idValue
idValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Unique string identifier value | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: industry (值: None) - The industry that this company operates in
monthlySpend (值: None) - The phone number of the user
name (值: None) - Name of the user
plan (值: None) - The name of the plan you have associated with the company
size (值: None) - The number of employees in this company
website (值: None) - The URL for this company's website. Please note that the value specified here is not validated. Accepts any string.

customAttributesJson.name: customAttributesJson
customAttributesJson.description: A hash of key/value pairs to represent custom data you want to attribute to a user
customAttributesJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Attributes | 作用: A hash of key/value pairs to represent custom data you want to attribute to a user

customAttributesUi.name: customAttributesUi
customAttributesUi.description: A hash of key/value pairs to represent custom data you want to attribute to a user
customAttributesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Attributes | 作用: A hash of key/value pairs to represent custom data you want to attribute to a user | 默认值: {}
available_options: customAttributesValues (值: None)

deleteBy.name: deleteBy
available_options: ID (值: id) - The Intercom defined ID representing the Lead
User ID (值: userId) - Automatically generated identifier for the Lead

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email of the user | (必填项)

listBy.name: listBy
available_options: ID (值: id) - The Intercom defined ID representing the company
Company ID (值: companyId) - The company_id you have given to the company

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.description: The company ID you have defined for the company
companyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company ID | 作用: The company ID you have defined for the company
